item.description:
Hi All,

For those who might be available tomorrow (Thursday) evening, I thought we could try this ride again (sorry the last version of this ride was rained out and there was confusion as to where to meet).

I thought it might be fun to have a recurring, slightly more demanding ride along the Minuteman for people who want to get out after work and do a moderate workout before sunset.

This ride will start on the Minuteman Bike Trail in Arlington Center. We'll ride to Bedford and back to Arlington (with a short rest at the Beford end of the trail), maintaining an average pace of about 13 mph (depending on bike trail traffic). Total distance should be somewhere around 16 miles. The ride should take about 1.25 hours.

There is a public parking lot off of Medford Street in Arlington Center. Parking is free there from 6PM on. To avoid confusion, let's meet right under the minuteman bike trail sign (corner of Mass Ave and Pleasant Street) at 6:15PM and leave from there. Hope to see some of you there!

Helmets and water recommended.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet under sign for bike trail at corner of Route 60 (Pleasant Street) and Massachusetts Avenue in Arlington. We'll leave at 6:15pm.
item.name: Last-minute Thursday Night Minuteman Ride: Arlington to Bedford and Back
